title: 02/05/2021 - HOUR 2 - Feel A Draft, Malcolm Jenkins, Eric Mangini
itunes:title: 02/05/2021 - HOUR 2 - Feel A Draft, Malcolm Jenkins, Eric Mangini
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, the NFL Draft is the most exciting draft in all of sports because you never know where the next star of the league might come from. In other leagues, you see stars coming from light-years away. Plus, New Orleans Saints safety and budding filmmaker Malcolm Jenkins jumps on the show to discuss facing the quarterbacks in the Super Bowl--Kansas City's Patrick Mahomes and Tampa Bay's Tom Brady--as well as his latest film project. Finally, FOX Sports NFL analyst Eric Mangini stops by the Herd to discuss how each Super Bowl team should strategize to come out victorious. 



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
